Uses of Class
popt4jlib.MSSC.ClustererException

  • Packages that use ClustererException 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib.MSSC
    Package implements algorithms for Minimum-Sum-of-Square(-Errors)-Clustering, a well-defined optimization problem.

    • Uses of ClustererException in popt4jlib.MSSC

      Methods in popt4jlib.MSSC that throw ClustererException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClustererIntf.addVector(VectorIntf d)
      adds a VectorIntf to the set of vectors to be later clustered.
      java.util.Vector ClustererIntf.clusterVectors()
      cluster the document vectors and return the Vector with the cluster centers.
      java.util.Vector DetAnnealClusterer.clusterVectors()
      the most important method of the class.
      java.util.Vector GMeansMTClusterer.clusterVectors()
      the most important method of the class.
      java.util.Vector NeuralGasMTClusterer.clusterVectors()
      the most important method of the class.
      java.util.Vector NeuralGasMTClusterer.clusterVectorsOldnSlow()
      old and slow method that also implements the Neural-Gas algorithm.
      double EvaluatorIntf.eval(ClustererIntf cl)
      evaluates a particular Clusterer object's job (that must have already occured prior to this call).
      double KMeansSqrEvaluator.eval(ClustererIntf cl)
      return the sum of the distances of each document from the cluster center it belongs.
      double ClustererIntf.eval(EvaluatorIntf ev)
      evaluate the current clustering according to the EvaluatorIntf passed in.
      double DetAnnealClusterer.eval(EvaluatorIntf vtor)
      evaluate the clustering produced by this object using the argument passed in.
      double GMeansMTClusterer.eval(EvaluatorIntf vtor)
      returns the value for the current clustering, according to the evaluator object passed in the argument.
      double NeuralGasMTClusterer.eval(EvaluatorIntf vtor)
      returns the value for the current clustering, according to the evaluator object passed in the argument.
      static double KMeansSqrEvaluator.evalCluster(java.util.Vector docs)
      evaluates the Sum-of-Square-Errors of each VectorIntf in the docs argument from the collection's center.
      int[] ClustererIntf.getClusterCards()
      return an array of size equal to centers.size(), showing for each cluster i, the number of documents assigned to it.
      int[] DetAnnealClusterer.getClusterCards()
      return an array of the cardinality (size) of each cluster specified by the clustering indices of this object.
      int[] GMeansMTClusterer.getClusterCards()
      return an int[] specifying the cardinalities of each cluster in the current clustering.
      int[] NeuralGasMTClusterer.getClusterCards()
      return an int[] specifying the cardinalities of each cluster in the current clustering.
      int[] ClustererIntf.getClusteringIndices()
      return the clustering as a partition.
      java.util.Vector ClustererIntf.getIntermediateClusters()
      return in a Vector some or all of the clusters produced during the run of the clustering algorithm.
      java.util.Vector DetAnnealClusterer.getIntermediateClusters()
      return all the intermediate clusters produced by the clusterVectors() method.
      void ClustererIntf.setClusteringIndices(int[] asgn)
      set the ClustererIntf asgnmnt indices to the specified array.
      void ClustererIntf.setInitialClustering(java.util.Vector centers)
      sets the initial centers to be used by the clusterer in the clustering process.
      void DetAnnealClusterer.setInitialClustering(java.util.Vector centers)
      set the initial clustering centers the vector _centers is reconstructed, but the Document objects that are the cluster centers are simply passed as references.
      void GMeansMTClusterer.setInitialClustering(java.util.Vector centers)
      set the initial clustering centers.
      void NeuralGasMTClusterer.setInitialClustering(java.util.Vector centers)
      set the initial clustering centers.
